name: Charge it!
description:
This is my project submission for the Weekly Game Jam 176 with the theme "Charge".
Hotfix version uploaded. Thank you to Elric Murphy for finding the despawning bug.

I hope you guys like it, also in the launcher you might want to set the volume to 50-60% before launching it (see last attached image), just in case. Cheers! <3

It is a skill game where you have to provide inputs when required while keeping the charge, inspired by the mechanics of Guitar Hero-style but with a little twist.
The playable web version is has a sound issue, and has been removed temporarily.

The controls are your whole keyboard (letters), Space bar to charge, and Esc to restart the game, going back to the menu. 

NOTE: There is currently a engine bug related to the launcher, it will stay open after closing the game, and it might produce a visual glitch when startin gthe game again. To prevent this if you exited the game, close the launcher and reopen it from the executable.
I will be reporting that to the engine devs and hope it's fixed soon.

Videos:

  Again, I hope you enjoy my first ever released project. Please show it some love and thank you for giving it a try :) 

If you have any suggestions, be it gameplay/possible improvements, missing tags or a better category for the game, or anything else, please comment down below.
